channel.title: Godsword stances?
channel.description:
I equip a bandos godsword and get this stance..
[img]http://gyazo.com/e205e763c05c2411afb0f41896ff8545.png[/img]
and then equip bandos boots and it shows up in the weapon area
[img]http://gyazo.com/6a18253cfe55360678db9e2f53e9e070.png[/img]
what can i do to fix these?

item.title: Godsword stances?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

for the stance change the ints in itemdef.java or class8.java, you could change it to the same as any other godsword added

Read full topic

item.title: Godsword stances?
item.dc:creator: @dazi dazi
item.description:
@dazi wrote:

i dont know what to do with the gs stance but with the boots you need to go in you source and find item.java open it and find public static int boots and copy one like 3105, and paste it behind the , and then change 3105 to you boots id

Read full topic
